_header: Patience is a point though it displease oft
_description: Patience — 531 lines of alliterative unrhyming lines

BLCottNeroAX.First Lines:
Pacience is a poynt þaȝ hit displese ofteWhen heuy
                    herttes ben hurt wyth heþyng oþer elles…
BLCottNeroAX.Last Lines:
…Forþy penaunce and payne topreue hit in
                    syȝtÞat pacience is a nobel poynt þaȝ hit displese
                    ofte
